original_title: Gary Moore - The Definitive Montreux Collection
overview: Gary Moore is one of the best rock and blues guitarists ever to come out of Ireland. Following stints in Skid Row, Thin Lizzy and Colosseum II he began a hugely successful solo career in the eighties. Gary Moore has been a frequent visitor to Montreux over the years and this 2DVD set brings together his very best performances from five different concerts between 1990 and 2001.
title: Gary Moore - The Definitive Montreux Collection
